data.title: telugu · Datasets at Hugging Face
data.meta_description: We’re on a journey to advance and democratize artificial intelligence through open source and open science.
data.text:
Panchatantra kathalu gurinchi oka chinna essay rayandi.

Andhra Pradesh lo pillalaku moral values nerpinchadaniki vaadina kathalu.

Panchatantra kathalu Bharata desham lo chaala prasiddham, mukhyamga Andhra Pradesh lo pillalaki neethi bodhana chekkovalante, ee kathalu pradana moolam. Veeti kathalu puraana kaala nundi prajalu munduku teeskuni vacharu. Balala manassulo manchi chedulu peraganivvani, mariyu jeevithamlo edurkune vividha paristhithulalo yela melagalo nerpinchataniki Panchatantra kathalu key role play chesthayi. Ivi simple ga, yet at the same time, chala deeper meaning tho untayi. Pillalaku easily artham ayela, jantuvulu maharaja la tho, thotilu kukka pilla la tho, yenni rakalu scenarios create chesi bodhinchabadunu.

Telugu lo oka chinna Katha cheppandi, cricket match gurinchi, andhulo oka thrilling over vishayam lo explain cheyyandi.

India-Pakistan match lo last over lo jarigina sanghatana.

Last over ki India ki win avalante 15 runs avasaram undi. Pakistan bowler Wahab, ball vesindi full toss, batsman Dhoni crease lo ready. First ball, Dhoni strong ga hit chesi, long-on ki pampindi, ah ball boundary datindi, four runs vachayi! Crowd arupulu modhalayyayi. Rendava ball, short ball, Dhoni flick chesi, rendu runs theeskunnaru. Moodava ball, Yorker length, ikkada kuda Dhoni smart play tho single run thiskunnaru. Fourth ball, new batsman Kumar strike lo, konchem tension situation. Wahab bouncer vesi, but Kumar helmet daggariki ball raakunda, duck ayipoyaru, dot ball. Ippudu match last two balls lo, 8 runs kavali. Fifth ball, Kumar confidence tho, full swing lo ball ni connect chesi, ah ball sky high velthondi... long-off ki catch drop ayyindi, and runners rendu runs theeskunnaru. Ippudu last ball, 6 runs kavali for win. Wahab ball ni swing ivvadam try chestunnadu, andaru breath hold chesukunnaru. Kumar ready, eyes on the ball, swing chestu, ball ni bat mid part touch chesi, ah ball air lo, sixer ki velthondi... boundary cross chestundi, and yes, it's a SIX! Stadium lo pandaga la situation, India match gelichindi thrilling last over finish tho, and everybody is celebrating!

Cheppu, nee weekend plans enti?

Ee weekend lo nenu friends tho trekking ki vellabotunna. Oka chinna hill station ki plan chesam. Andhulo relax avvadaniki nenu chala excited ga unnanu.

Bagane undi! Trekking ante chala adventure ga untundi. Ayithe, safety measures anni pattukoni vellu. Photos teesukovadam marchipoku, share cheddam anukuntunna. Have a great trip!

Tiffin ki emi cook cheyali ani suggest cheyandi, intlo eggs mariyu bread unnai.

Tiffin options with eggs and bread.

Mi tiffin ki, bread toast chesukoni, daani paina scrambled eggs petteyandi. It’s simple and tasty. Ledha, French toast kuda try cheyocchu; it’s a sweet alternative. Breakfast burrito style lo kuda prepare cheyocchu, egg curry wrap chesukoni.

Please create a shopping list in Romanized Telugu for an upcoming birthday party.

The birthday party will be for a child turning 5 years old and expects around 20 kids.

Shopping list:

Write a short essay on prapancha warming (global warming) and its effects on Parisaralu (environment).

Not applicable

Prapancha warming, leda global warming, bhoomi meeda oka pedda samasya. Idi arogyakaranga ledhu, maanavula jeevitam lo bahu pramukhyata vahinchindi. Atmosphere lo greenhouse gases perugudam valla, bhoomi Ushnoghatana (temperature) kuda penchuthondi. Ee perugu valla, prakrutik vanarulani mariyu jeevarashulu bahu prabhavitam avthunnayi. Samudra matti (sea levels) penchadam valla coastal areas lo varadhalu mariyu erojanalu (erosion) sambhavitam avuthunnai. Parisaralu meeda ee warming yeno prabhavalanu kaliginchindi, endhulonu jantu jalamula allupu (biodiversity loss), akalam lo varsha padadam, severe weather events, health issues modhalainavi.

Oka simple Telugu poem raayi parimalaalu gurinchi, mariyu adi English-lo mix chesi prakriti andhani.

'Prakriti andhani' ane theme tho oka kavita

Prakriti andhani chuttu choodu, aakashaanni paiki choosthe, stars anni twinkle avthunnayi. Chettlu, puvvulu entha beautiful ga unnayo, vatiki vachina parimalaalu manasuku haayiga untundi. Sunrise mottam red and orange colors blend avthu, evening sky lo cool blue shade tho mix avthu. Prakriti every angle nunchi mana senses ni touch chesthu untundi. Ee scene lo unna harmony ani chudatam lo own kind of happiness undi.

Panimanishi ki cheppu muggulu vesthe manchi bonuses isthaamu ani.

---

Sare, nenu panimanishi tho matladuthanu. Aameku muggulu vesthe extra bonuses isthaamani cheppanu. Aameki chala santhosham vachindi. Repu nunchi roju muggulu vesthundhi ani cheppindi.

Describe how to prepare Mango Lassi in Telugu with English nouns.

null

Mango lassi ni tayaru cheyadaniki munda, fresh and ripe mangoes teesukoni, peel chesi cut cheyali. Taruvatha, oka blender lo a mango pieces ni, thaggiyinchina curd (yogurt), konni ice cubes, and theesukovalasina sugar kalipi blend cheyali. Blend ayyaka, lassi ni tall glass lo pour chesi, poddutti unna fresh mint leaves tho garnish cheyali. Chilled mango lassi nuvve chesukuni taste cheskotaniki ready!

Explain in simple Telugu what to do if someone loses their phone.

Naa phone poyindi, em cheyali?

Phone poyinappudu, modata sim card company ki call chesi sim card block cheyalani cheppandi. Tarvata, 'Find My Device' ani Google lo search chesi mi account tho sign-in ayyi, phone location try chestey manchidi. Ledante police complaint file cheyandi. Inka phone kanapadakapothe, new phone konukkovali.

Rahaalu cheppu about your favorite book in Telugu.

Naaku Harry Potter books chaala ishtam, first book nundi chivari book daaka anni thrilling ga unnayi.

Harry Potter series naaku kuda chaala ishtam. First book 'The Philosopher's Stone' nunchi start ayyi, 'The Deathly Hallows' varaku prati book lo magic, friendship, courage anevi bale ga explain chesaru J.K. Rowling. Prati book lo mystery untundi, adi solve cheyadaniki Harry, Ron, Hermione laaga mohamati ga wait chesthaamu.

Cheppu naaku okka roju viniyogincha galigina smart phone gurinchi.

Redmi Note 10 Pro

Redmi Note 10 Pro oka manchi smartphone. Dhiniki oka 6.67-inch Super AMOLED display undi, manchi brightness and colors tho. Gaming ki and daily use ki chala baguntundhi because powerful Snapdragon 732G processor undi. Camera kuda baane undi, rear lo 64MP primary camera tho patu wide-angle, macro, and depth sensors undi. Selfie kosam 16MP front-facing camera undi. Battery life kuda chaala manchidi, 5020mAh capacity tho, full day use ki no problem. Fast charging kuda support chesthundi. Overall ga, budget-friendly price lo manchi features unna phone.

Describe the process of preparing chai in a mixture of English and Telugu.

How to make chai in Telugu-English mix?

Chai chesthunappudu mundhu water boil chesko. Aa tharuvatha tea powder, sugar, and koncham elachi powderkalipi, baga kachinchuko. Last lo fresh milk add chesi, inko sari full boil ichey. Flame off cheskuni, strain chesi, enjoy your chai!

Telugu lo manchi book gurinchi cheppandi.

Harry Potter

Harry Potter anedi oka marvellous fantasy novel series. Ivi British author J.K. Rowling rasindhi. Ee series lo unna prathee book manasuni alluthundi, kalalo prapanchanni chupisthundi. Magicians, their magic, Hogwarts ani oka magical school, and there pere prakaram jarige adventures chala interesting ga untai. Ee books chadavatame kadu, manishi lo creativity ni kuda penchuthayi.

Cheap and best restaurant lo dinner ki suggest cheyyi.

Vegetarian food preference undi, and nenu kukatpally lo untunanu.

Meeru definitely Green Bawarchi ani restaurant try cheyochu kukatpally lo. Akkada vegetarian options chaala bavuntayi and budget ki kuda pocket-friendly. Paneer butter masala and veg biryani ikkada must-try dishes.

Ask your friend in Telugu to watch a new movie and give his opinion on it.

Ee kotha cinema chudamani cheppu mari daniki em opinion unte cheppamani adugu.

Sare, cinema chusthanu. Movie chala bagunattu undi ante, naku message cheyu. Cheddame anipisthe kuda cheppu, vere movie plan chestham.

Cheppandi oka manchi restaurant gurinchi, adi Hyderabad lo unna unique dish ento kuda cheppandi.

Ekkada dorukutundi, taste ela untundi, price range enti?

Hyderabad lo 'Paradise' ani oka famous restaurant undi; akkada biryani chala baaguntundi. 'Paradise Special Biryani' pratyekatmyna dish, dani flavor unique ga, masala to kooda spicy ga untundi. Restaurant ambience chala pleasant ga untundi, service kuda fast. Medium price range lo untundi, rendu manishiki karchu almost ₹500 nunchi ₹1500 varaku untundi. Weekend rojulu advancelo table book cheyadam manchidi, lekapothe waiting ekkuva undachu.

Write a short essay about the importance of online education in the current scenario.

null

Online vidya prasakthini gurinchi cheppalante, ippati paristhithullo daani patti chaala mukhyam. Internet valla andariki accessible aiyyindi, ekkadunna, eppudaina chaduvukovadaniki kotha avakashalu theesukundhi. Ee COVID-19 mahamari samayamloo schools and colleges anni close ayyaka, online education ye option ga migilindi. Virtual classrooms lo live videos, recorded lectures tho education continous ga jaruguthondhi. Okko student ki personalized learning experience kuda labhinchuthondi. Inka edaina topic artham kakapothe, Google lo search cheste chalu. Self-paced learning valla time manage cheyadam kuda easy aypoyindi. Online education future lo kuda manchi development ke avasaram ani naku anpinchindi. Ee roju school or college lo join avvakapothe, online courses tho skill set penchukovachu, jobs ke ready ga undachu. So, overall online vidya valu students chaduvukovadaniki, nerchukovadaniki chaala upayogapaduthundi.

Thindi gurinchi oka sanna kadha rayandi.

Hyderabad style biryani

Hyderabad style biryani gurinchi cheppalante, adhi okka gastronomic wonder. Oka roju, Ramesh ane vadu friends tho biryani thinadaniki Hyderabad lo unna famous restaurant ki velladu. Restaurant loki adugupettagane, masala yugala gandham tho vadi appetite double aindi. Menu lo biryani peru chuste, Ramesh ki neellu ooripoyayi. Waiter vachinappudu, “Anna, oka biryani parcel cheyava, masala ekkuva unna, chicken kuda boneless ga ani order ichadu. Tharwatha intiki cherukunna Ramesh, TV on chesi IPL cricket match chusthu, taste ki, aroma ki world famous Hyderabad biryani ni enjoy chesadu.

Explain the concept of global warming in simple terms in Telugu-English mix.

Avi, nenu global warming gurinchi simple ga explain cheyyamani adigaru. Explain cheyyi.

Sure Avi, global warming ante mana prapancham lo unna temperatures anni gradual ga penchudam because of man-made activities. Ee heat penchadam valla glaciers melt avthunnayi, sea levels peruguthunnayi, weather patterns change avthunnayi. Adi chala dangerous situation, because adi manushula ki, animals ki, and mana entire ecosystem ki chala problems create chestundi. Clean energy sources vaadatam start cheyyali, like solar and wind, pollution ni takkuva cheyyali, reduce, reuse, recycle principles follow avvali. Sariga artham ayyinda?

Describe your favorite movie in Telugu and explain why you like it.

My favorite movie is The Shawshank Redemption.

Naa istamaina cinema The Shawshank Redemption. Adi oka inspiring drama, and it shows how hope and friendship can win over despair. Andy and Red characters chala baga design chesaru, and their journey through adversities naaku chala connect aiyindi. Cinemalo background music, narration, and the twist at the end prati okkati kuda perfect. Adi naaku inspiration istundi and everytime na mood uplift avutundi nenu daanini chusinappudu.

Cheppu nenu dinner ki emi prepare cheskovalo.

Vegetarian pulao with raitha.

Alage cheseddam. Pulao kosam basmati annam, konni kooragayalu konukkovali. Raitha kosam perugu kuda kavali. First, annam vandukuni, side lo pettukovali. Kooragayalu anni sannaga slice chesi, masalaalu vesi kalapali. Oka cooker lo oil vesi, jeelakarra, lavangam vesi, annam mix chesi few minutes for cook cheyyali. Raitha kosam, perugu lo kothimeera, karivepaku, uppu kalipi fridge lo chill cheyyali. Simple ga healthy dinner ready!

Cheppu Eiffel Tower gurinchi oka chinnapati paragraph.

Eiffel Tower Paris lo prasiddhamaina structure ani.

Eiffel Tower Paris lo unna prapancha prasiddha iron lattice tower deeni. Ide France lo atyadhika parikshalu jarige sthalalu lo okati. Gustave Eiffel ane engineer ee tower design chesaru, andukey ee peru. 1889 lo complete aina ee structure, appatlo world lo ati ettaina man-made structure ga record cheskundi. Paris ki velli, Eiffel Tower chudakapothe akkada trip incomplete ane cheppali. Akkada nunchi Paris nagaram chala sundaranga kanipisthundi, ee view kosam prati year laksha lakshal mandi tourists vastharu.

Telugu lo mimalni ela pilustharo cheppandi? (Tell me, how do you call yourself in Telugu?)

Naa peru Suresh.

Naku thelusu, nee peru Suresh ani. (I know, your name is Suresh.)

Velli movie tickets book cheyyi online lo.

RRR movie, 2 tickets, Saturday night show.

Done, RRR movie ki Saturday night show ki 2 tickets successfully book chesaanu. Confirmation email neeku pampinchaanu. Theatre lo direct ga mobile lo QR code chupisthe chaalu.

Oka chinna paragraph rasi, ee roju neenu chesina pani gurinchi vivaristhu unna dairy entry ni Telugu lo Cheppu.

Mowlali park ki morning walk ki vellanu. Taravatha Hyderabad biryani tinesanu. Evening lo koddiga coding practice chesanu.

Today morning, nenu fresh avvagane, walking kosam Mowlali park ki vellanu. Akkada roughly around 30 minutes fast walk chesi, park lo kurchunna bench meeda konchem relax ayyanu. Aa taravata, nenu hyderabad biryani craving tho, local Biryani point ki velli, full meals biryani order chesi, ruchi ruchi ga tinesanu. Bhojanam taravata, koddiga lazy feel avthunna kuda, evening time anna, konchem coding practice cheyadam jarigindi. Roju valla coding skills ni enhance cheyadam lo naku oka different satisfaction untundi.

Telugu lo family members gurinchi oka chinna paragraph rasi pampandi.

Ma family lo nenu, na parents, and na thammudu untam. Prathi weekend family antha kalisi movie chusthamu or park ki velthamu.

Ma family chala chinna and santosham ga untundi. Nenu, na nanna, amma mariyu na chinni thammudu untamu. Memu chaala close ga untamu and prathee sari time dorikinappudu kalisi gadipesthamu. Ee weekend ante, cinema chudatam leda park ki vellatam ma regular activities lo ondi. Family time ante naaku chala istam and ivanni mana bandham inka balam ga chestayi.

Suggest a breakfast menu item that is a mix of Indian and American styles.

Indian-American fusion breakfast ideas.

Miriyala flavored oatmeal! Oatmeal ni koddiga Indian touch isthu, miriyala podi kalipi tayaruchesukovachu. Healthy and spicy flavor tho, idi perfect fusion breakfast option!

Oka manchi coffee shop gurinchi cheppu, ikkada Hyderabad lo.

Naku oka meeting kosam decent coffee shop kavali, comfortable seating and Wi-Fi tho.

Meeru definitely ChaiKahani ane coffee shop try cheyandi. Ade nenu ippudu recommend chestunnanu, adi Banjara Hills road number 10 lo undi. Vallaki chala manchi ambiance undi, comfortable seating arrangements tho patu free Wi-Fi kuda provide chestharu. Coffee menu kuda extensive, from espresso to cold brews varaku anni ruchulu unnayi. Meeting ki perfect place!

Rasagulla tinesi review ivvu.

Chala soft ga unnayi, sweet gaadu perfect, but konchem ekkuva soggy ga feel avtunayi.

Mein review chaduvutunna, rasagullalu quality paranga bagunnayi, kani consistency inka improve cheyyali anipistunnadi. Sweetness saripoyindi kani, next time koncham tight ga undela chuskovali. Mee feedback valuable, dhanyavadalu!

Cheppandi, Elon Musk gurinchi mee abhiprayam ento Telugu lo.

Elon Musk innovative entrepreneur ga mikemaina alochincha vaallu ante?

Elon Musk gurinchi maatladukunte, athanu oka uttejaparudaayi entrepreneur. SpaceX, Tesla lanti companies tho prapancham lo manchi marpu theesukuvachchadantu naa abhiprayam. Athani innovation and risk-taking attitude inspire chesthayi. Atlanea, athani futuristic visions kooda chala impressive. Elon Musk nijanga oka visionaary leader ani naaku anipisthundi.

Samacharam gurinchi cheppandi corona virus spread avvadam gurinchi.

Prapancham motham lo corona virus ela spread ayyindo cheppara?

Corona virus prapancham anthata vistharisthondi anedi pakka nijam. Starting lo idi Wuhan ane China lo unna oka city nundi modalaindi. Charithraka saarilendi, ee virus jati janala madhya quick ga spread avvadam chusi andaru bayapadipoyaru. Prapandam anthata janalu ee virus valana suffering avthunaru, many countries lock down ki velthunaru, travel restrictions pedthunaru. Social distancing anduku important ani chepthunaru experts. Mask veskoni, chethulu baga wash cheskokapoddi, virus spread avadam aapalante ee rendu rules follow avvalsinde. Vaccines development lo unnai, kani full ga control cheyadaniki inko konni months paduthai antunnaru. Stay safe and stay informed ani prati okkaru cheppukuntunaru.

Telugu lo oka vaarthaanni English lo explain cheyyi.

aahaaram

Aahaaram ante food or meal ane artham. Daanini English lo we usually 'food' ani antaam. Ade mana daily life lo tine padarthalu anni kalipi, specific ga okati chepthe, adi 'meal' autundi. Udaharanaku, breakfast, lunch, inka dinner anni 'aahaaram' kindaki vasthayi.

Amma tho chapandi mee intlo recent ga celebrate chesina event gurinchi.

Ma cousin ki pelli ayindi, andhulo chaala mandhi vaccharu.

Ohh, adhi chaala sandadi ga undi untundhi. Mee cousin pelli ceremony lo emi special dishes chesaru? Evari tho baaga enjoy chesav? Decorations ela unnaayi? Sangeet night unda? Photos shoot chesara?

Describe how you spend a Sunday in Telugu using simple present tense verbs and mix English nouns that you commonly use.

---

Nenu Sunday roju early ga lestanu. Fresh ayi, coffee tagesthanu and newspaper chaduvutunnanu. Breakfast lo idly or dosa tinesthanu. Tarvata, family tho church ki velthanu. Madhyahnam time, friends tho cricket aduthanu or movies chusthanu. Evening time lo, park ki veli walk chesthanu or cycling chesthanu. Night, dinner ga biryani tinesthanu. Sunday anta relax ayi, next week kosam ready avuthanu.

Describe the weather in Hyderabad today in a mixture of Telugu and English.

Hyderabad weather status.

Hyderabad lo today weather chala bagundi. Udayam nunchi clear skies and sunny ga undi. Temperature around 30 degrees Celsius ga undi with gentle breeze. Evening time ki koncham clouds form ayye chances unnai but overall, pleasant weather to enjoy the day.

Explain the importance of yoga in daily jeevitham.

What are the benefits of doing yoga regularly?

Yoga prati roju chesthe chala labhalu untayi. Prathamaanga, manasika shanti ni istundi, stress levels ni taggistundi. Deha balam penchutundi, flexibility ni kooda improves chestundi. Alage yoga, manchi breathing techniques kuda nerpinchutundi, idi overall health ki manchidi. Pratidi, yoga manaki deep sleep kuda guarantees chestundi, idi mana energy levels ni next day ki ready chestundi. Regular yoga practice chestunte, long-term lo immunity kuda bagupadtundi, mana body ni various diseases nundi kappadutundi.

Meere oka roju gataaniki travel cheyyadam elaantido cheppandi, kani prati sentence end lo meeku ishtamaina Telugu dish peru pettandi.

Nenu Paris ki velladaniki ready avutunna, travel plan enti?

Mee journey start chesthu, me first destination Eiffel Tower undali. Akkada nunchi Seine River cruise lo enjoy cheyyandi, and don't forget to take lots of photos Biryani. Taravaata, Louvre Museum ki vellandi, chala famous art pieces unnayi Pesarattu. Aa taravaata shopping kosam Champs-Élysées velthe better, famous brands anni Akki Roti. Evening ki relaxation kosam Luxembourg Gardens ki vellandi, chala pleasant ga untundi Dosa. Lastly, local French cuisine try cheyyandi, but mana Telugu taste miss ayye chances unnayi, so end of the day meere oka manchi Pulihora tinandi.

Ask your friend in Telugu to suggest a good English movie to watch this weekend.

Ee weekend ki manchii English movie suggest cheyyi?

Inception choodu, chaala mind-bending movie, naku chaala ishtam.

Cheppandi, Mana 'green energy' pai oka chinna vyaasam Telugu lo ela rayalo.

Green energy gurinchi vyaasam rastunna, vishaya sangrahana kosam konni points ivvandi.

Green energy ante renewable sources nundi vastundi ani munduga explain cheyyandi. Solar, wind, hydro, geothermal lanti renewable sources ni udaharisthu vaatini enduku upayoginchaalo value chupisthu write cheyyandi. Taruvata, ee sources nunchi vachina energy vaalla pollution takkuvaga untundi, environment ki safe ani points esi rastunaru. Alaaga, mana India lo green energy projects ela implement avutunnayo, Telangana lo solar projects gurinchi oka udaharanam ivvandi. Chivari conclusion lo, prathi okkaru green energy vaipu shift avvali enduku avsaramo oka call-to-action tho end cheyyandi.

Cheppandi Prapancham lo jarige oka pedda news event gurinchi, detail ga explain cheyyandi.

COVID-19 pandemiki prapancham ela respond ayyindi?

COVID-19 pandemic prapamcham lo oke saari kanipinchindi 2019 chivari nunchi, Wuhan, China lo modalaindi. Dinni World Health Organization (WHO) oka 'Public Health Emergency of International Concern' ga January 30, 2020 na declare chesindi. Prapancham lo prathi desam ee virus tho fight cheyyadaniki lockdowns pettindi, travel restrictions impose chesindi, mask wearing and social distancing ni encourage chesindi. Vaccines develop cheyyadaniki scientists night and day work chesaru, and chala takkuva samayam lo multiple vaccines market lo ki vachayi. Ee pandemic valla economy ki chala damage ayyindi, kani prapancham untu continue fight chestundi ee unseen enemy tho.

Describe the weather in Hyderabad using phrases in Romanized Telugu.

Summer season in Hyderabad.

Hyderabad lo summer season appudu chala hot untundi. Sun direct ga face meedha paduthundi, chuttoo manam just gali ni feel avvalem. Afternoon time lo road meedha vellevalu takkuva untaru because endalu chala ekkuva untai. Night time ki kuda chala warm gaane untundi, fans and coolers lekunda nidrapovadam kashtam. “Eeroju endalu baga unnayi!” ani prathi okkaru matladukuntuntaru.

Write a short paragraph about the importance of water conservation in Telugu with English nouns mixed in.

Water conservation methods.

Manamu andariki telisina vishayame, water conservation chala important. Daily vaadukalo, industries lo, agriculture lo manam used water quantity ni takkuva cheyyali. Methods like rainwater harvesting, drip irrigation, and low-flow toilets vaadukovadam valla, water ni save chesukovachu. Manchi future kosam, ee resources ni chala carefully manage cheyali. Ila cheste, manam water scarcity nunchi raksha pondhachu, earth ni green and clean ga kapadachu.

Cheppu ekkada tiyyalo telusukondi.

Starbucks deggara parking lot lo na car key miss ayindi.

Oh, car key miss ayithe tension avvakkarledu. Starbucks deggara security office ki velli akkada ask cheyandi. Valle CCTV footage check chesi, key dorikindante andistharu. Leka pothe, local locksmith ni contact cheyandi, duplicate key cheyinchukovachu. Next time key chain lo tracker pettukunte easy ga kanipisthundi.

Write an essay on the importance of clean energy in the future in Romanized Telugu.

Clean energy yenduku important anedi discuss cheyandi, future generations kosam vati benefits emiti?

Clean energy manaki future lo chala avasaram. Petrol, diesel lanti traditional energy sources pollution create chestai, global warming ki karanam avutai. Clean energy valla ee problems taggutai. Solar, wind, hydro power lanti renewable sources environment friendly, eppatiki ayipovu emi kadu. Veeti valla manam nature ni kuda protect cheskovachu, alane future generations ki better living conditions provide cheyachu. Manaki clean air undi, sustainable resources tho future bright ga undochu. Anduvalla, every country clean energy sources develop cheyadaniki effort pedtunnai. Manam kuda solar panels, electric vehicles use chesi contribute cheyali manchi future kosam.

Cheppu, mee intiki vache route enti?

Nenu Banjara Hills nundi Secunderabad station ki velthunna.

Okay, Banjara Hills nunchi start aithe munduga Punjagutta junction meedugaa vellu. Akkada nundi left teesi Begumpet road meedha continue avvu. Malli left teesukoni Paradise circle meedha nuvvu Secunderabad station ki cheravachu.

Write a short essay on the importance of paadhyam (study) in life, blending English and Telajña words in the way a local might speak.

Importance of Study in Life

Mana jeevitham lo paadhyam chala important. This is because paadhyam through manaku knowledge peruguthundi, manam prapancham lo jaruguthunna changes understand cheyagalaru. Every day kotha kotha technology lu vastunnai, kotha ideas evolve authunnai. Ilanti environment lo paadhyam proper ga levakapothe, manam venakabadi potam. Inka, paadhyam tho manaki manchitanam kuda vasthundi. Chaala mandiki help cheyalanukuntam, kani daaniki sariyaina skills undali, adi paadhyam dwara ye sadhyam avuthundi. Jobs dorakadam nundi personal development varaku, all areas lo paadhyam ki oka vital role undhi. So, manam andaram paadhyam chese time ni waste cheyakunda, full use cheskoni, mana life goal reach avvali. Study manaku manchi future ivvadam lo key role play chesthundi.

Chinna pillalaki English alphabets nerpinchataniki on-demand rhyme cheppandi.

Alphabet rhyme with a fruit theme.

A for Apple, a juicy apple! B for Banana, bendy banana! C for Cherry, chinni cherry! D for Dates, teepi dates! E for Elderberry, tasty elderberry! F for Fig, fiber-filled fig! G for Grape, greeny grape! H for Honeydew, honey laga honeydew! I for Ice-cream fruit, icy ice-cream fruit! J for Jackfruit, pedda jackfruit! K for Kiwi, greeny kiwi! L for Lemon, pulupu lemon! M for Mango, maadipandu mango! N for Nectarine, nuvvula nectarine! O for Orange, orange lanti orange! P for Papaya, pachi papaya! Q for Quince, rare quince! R for Raspberry, ruchi raspberry! S for Strawberry, sweet strawberry! T for Tangerine, tangy tangerine! U for Ugli fruit, oka prakaramaina ugli fruit! V for Vanilla Bean, vanilla flavour bean! W for Watermelon, water lanti watermelon! X for Xigua, Chinese watermelon xigua! Y for Yellow passion fruit, yellow color passion fruit! Z for Zucchini, kura chesukune zucchini!

Explain in Telugu using Romanized script how to make Avakai, a traditional Andhra pickle.

Detailed recipe steps in English for making Avakai.

Munduga, mudda aavakayaku avasaramaina vittanalanu siddham cheskoni, aavakayi mukkalanu kuda siddham cheyandi. Taruvata, aavakayi mukkalalo uppu, karam, aava nune (sesame oil) mariyu endu menthulu cherkoni baga kalipi, oka air-tight containerlo pettandi. Danni roju okasari baga kaluputhu, naalugu ayanalu alane unchandi till oilu pickle mukkalu baga soak ayetappudu. Appudu mee avakai pickle ready. Ela chesthe, avakai authentic ruchito, long time varaku fresh ga untundi.

Rastu oka short essay Paris prayaanam gurinchi, oka Telugu ammayi point of view nunchi.

Nenu modalu pettina paristhiti and Paris journey gurinchi.

Paris prayaanam entha excitingo naku ippatike telusu. Nenu dachina dreams anni ikkada nijam avutunnayi. Champs-Elysées lo walk chesthu, Eiffel Tower ni choosthunte, na heart full happy ga feel avutundi. French food tinadam aithe intha varaku anubhavinchi ledu. Crepes, croissants, and cheese varieties annitiki na tastebuds ki kotta anubhavam. Louvre museum daggara monna art pieces choosi, history lo ne jeevinchadam anipinchindi. Every day, nenu kotha culture ni experience chesthunnanu, and it's very enriching. Paris, you are truly la ville d'amour!

Nee friend tho sampradayam patla open-ended essay raayi.

Maadi Telugu Bharatiyula kutumbam, mana sampradayam entho goppadi, dani meeda essay raayali.

Mana sampradayam annaka vachhe prathama sphotam ma Bharatiyula adbutala chestalu mariyu parabrahma archanalu. Aa acharalu anni sandarbhalaku sambandhinchina paryaya paddatulalo untayi. Prati okkariki tana kulam, matam mariyu aadhyatmika karmanu saagisthundi. Mana peddalu cheppe niti bodhanalu, pandugalu, mariyu vratalu anni mana sampradayalu parichayam chestayi. Ee sampradayam lo bala and chaithanyam unna sandesam undi, adi mana taratari pragathi ke margam chupisthundi. Sampradayam antey modati ga nammakam, itihasam, maryada raagalu lo padilam avutai. Anduke maadi Bharatiyula kutumbam, ma sampradayam lo unna ee visheshalu prathi roju mana jevithalu lo palukubadi ga cherusthu untam.

Telugu lo ma intlo jarige activities gurinchi rayandi.

Ma family antha weekend rojuna nature walk ki vellamu.

Weekend roju, ma family antha kalisi nature walk ki velladam jarigindi. Udayam early lechi tayaru avadam nunchi, car lo songs vintu, nearby park ki velladam modhalu pettam. Akkada chala fresh gali and prakruthi soundlu vinipistu, manchi time spend chesam. Birds chusi, chettlu mokkalani observe chesi, konni photos kuda theesukunnam. Andari mohalu ala clear ayipoyayi. Return journey lo, intiki vachesariki andaram energized ga feel ayyam. Idi ma regular weekend activity lo oka part.

Describe cheyandi e-roju mi lunch lo emi tinnaaru.

Naan bread and paneer curry.

E-roju naa lunch lo naan bread and paneer curry tinnanu. Curry chala bagundi, naan kuda fresh ga undi. Ruchi chala manchi combination lo undi.

Ask how to prepare tomato pappu in a traditional Telugu style.

Tomato pappu ela cheyali traditional ga?

Tomato pappu cheyadaniki munduga, tomatoes, pappu (lentils), ullipaya (onion), and green chillies konukkoni, anni clean ga wash chesi, pappuni cooker lo vesi, 3 whistles vakka pakkana petteyali. Tomatoes ni small pieces ga cut chesi, ullipaya ni kuda slice chesi, pan lo oil vesi, aa cut chesina pieces ni veyali. Tarwata, mustard seeds, jeera, hing, red chillies, and curry leaves vesi tadka chesi, all cooking ayinaka, cooked pappuni tomato mixture lo kalipi, salt and turmeric powder add chesi simmer lo 5 nundi 10 minutes varaku cook cheyali. Finally, coriander leaves tho garnish chesi, hot rice tho serve cheyandi. Traditional tomato pappu tayaru!

Vivarinchandi how to prepare a Computers visleshana for a school project using simple English and Telugu mix.

School project on the impact of computers.

School project kosam 'Computers visleshana' prepare cheyadaniki first, topic gurinchi manchi research cheyandi. Internet lo enno articles, reports, and documentaries vunnai ee topic meeda. First, gather chesina information ni organize cheyandi. Introduction lo computers yela manushula jeevithalanu marchayyo explain cheyandi. Taruvatha, different fields lo computers vaadakam ela perigindo, vati positive and negative effects ento detailed ga vivarinchandi. Lastly, mee personal experience or meeku telisina someone's experience ni example ga teesukoni, computers mana daily life lo ela help chestunnayo cheppandi. Visual aids like images, charts, or PowerPoint slides use cheyandi information ni clear ga explain cheyadaniki. Practice well, so you can deliver a confident presentation.

Explain the importance of Haritha Haram program in Telugu and its impact.

What is Haritha Haram and how does it benefit our environment?

Haritha Haram oka peddala planting initiative started by Telangana government. Idi environment ni protect cheyadaniki, green cover ni penchadaniki mariyu climate change effects ni tagginchadaniki help chesthundi. Ee program dwara chala lakhs mokkalu natu, eco-balance ni maintain chesthunnaru, pollution ni control lo petti, fresh air andhinchadaniki krushi chesthunnaru. Citizens ki kuda consciousness peruguthondi nature meeda, andhuke Haritha Haram chala important program gaa consider chesthunnaru Telangana lo.

Cheppandi, Covid-19 gurinchi mana Telugu vallu ela feel avuthunnaro detailed ga.

Covid-19 impact on daily life

Covid-19 valla mana daily life chala change aindi. Office work nundi, pillala chaduvulatho patu, inti panulavaraku prathi okkaru online shift ayyaru. Pani pata nundi remote work ki marindi, pillalu Zoom classes attend avthunnaru. Manushulu ikkada Hindu, Muslim, Christian ane bhinnam lekunda, mask esukoni, sanitizer vadi, social distance maintain chesthunnaru. Festivals ki kuda chinna get-togethers matrame chesthunnaru. Ante, Covid-19 mana samajika sambandhalanu, arogya bhadratha ni chala impact chesindi anamata.

Write a short essay on the importance of water conservation in Telugu mixed with English nouns.

Importance of water conservation

Neeru conservation ante entha importanto mana andariki telusu. Water mana daily life lo oka basic resource and mana survival ki key factor. But, prapancham lo water resources baaga polluting avtunnai, wasting avtunnai. So, manaku necessity undi water ni save cheyadam lo. Simple methods nundi grand projects varaku, every action counts. Rain water harvesting, taps close cheyadam when not in use, check chesukovadam for leaks, efficient watering systems in agriculture, ila chala neeru save cheyochu. Anni cities lo, villages lo awareness create cheyali water conservation meda. Future generations ki clean water undela, mana responsibility manam gamaninchali. Save water ante just oka phrase matrame kadu, it's a critical action. Neeru lenidhe life ledu, anduku water conservation ni seriously teesukundam.

Rendu rojulaku oka plan cheppandi Hyderabad lo emi chudali anedi.

Weekend lo Hyderabad ki veltunnanu, budget-friendly places emi visit cheyali?

Hyderabad lo budget-friendly tourism spots chaala unnayi. Meeku rendu rojulu time undi anukunte, modati roju meeku Golconda Fort ni chudataniki suggest chesta, akkada history and architecture rendu mesmerize chesthayi. Afternoon ki Birla Mandir ki velli peaceful time spend cheyyandi. Rendava roju morning time lo Charminar ki velli, akkada street shopping cheyyandi. Lopalane unna Salar Jung Museum ni miss avvakandi, chala interesting artifacts untayi. Late evening lo Hussain Sagar ki velli boating chesi, Lumbini Park lo musical fountain show enjoy cheyyandi. Hyderabad biryani tinakunda velle bedha padyakandi, Irani chai with Osmania biscuit kuda try cheyandi Police Bazaar lo.

Vivarinchu how to make pasta with Indian twist vaati lo.

Simple pasta tayaaru chesukovadaniki kavalsina ingredients emiti?

Simple Indian twist pasta ki kavalsina ingredients ivi: Pasta (mekaroni or penne), tomato sauce, onion (ullipaya), green chillies (pachimirapakayalu), ginger-garlic paste (allam-velulli paste), garam masala, jeera (cumin seeds), oil, salt, and coriander leaves (kotthimeera). Basic ga, meelaga water boil chesi, andulo konchem uppu veskuni, pasta veskoni soft ayina taruvata drain chesesi aside pettukovali. Taruvata, pan heat chesi, oil veskuni jeera, chopped onion, green chillies veyyali. Onion brown color ochaka, ginger-garlic paste add chesi konni seconds fry cheyali. Aa taruvata, tomato sauce, garam masala, salt kalipi, konchem water tho simmer cheyali. Final ga, drained pasta ni sauce loki mix chesi, garnish chesthe with fresh coriander, mee Indian twist pasta ready.

Rathri dinner ki emi cook cheyali anukuntunnavo suggest cheyyi.

Manaku Italian food istam, light ga undali, konchem spicy kuda.

Hmmm, Spaghetti Aglio e Olio try cheddam. Simple, spicy, and light dish. Chala quick ga prepare chestham, fresh garlic and red pepper flakes add chesthe, mana taste ki suit avtundi. Salad tho pakkana pettukoni, perfect Italian dinner ready!

Cheppandi mariyu vivechinchandi ee vishayam meedha mee abhiprayam.

Current environmental issues and their impact on future generations

Mana current environmental issues chala serious. Pollution, deforestation, climate change lantivi future generations ki pedda challenge istunnay. Air quality padipovadam valla breathing problems ekkuva avthunnay. Water sources kalushitam avuthunnayi, health issues vastunnay. Climate change valla weather patterns maripothunnay, prapancha alalo natural disasters frequency kuda penchukuntunnay. Mana responsibilities ga treat cheyyalante, we need to reduce carbon footprint, adopt renewable energy sources, and maintain sustainable practices. Future generations ki manchi environment and resources unna life ivvalante, current generation nundi action start cheyyali.

Oka roju at the beach spend chese plan rayandi using Telugu and English.

Friends tho weekend ki Vizag beach ki vellali, fun activities and relaxation kosam.

Me plan chala manchi idea. Morning early ga intiki pickup cheyinchukoni Vizag beach ki start avudham. Beach ki cherukunaka, modata sand lo walk chesi, sea breeze enjoy cheddham. Friends andaram kalisi volleyball game arrange cheyochu. Aa taruvata, konni local seafood dishes try cheyochu beach side lo unna stalls lo. Relax ayye good music pettukoni, waves sound vinukuntu chill avudham. Next day morning, sunrise chusthu yoga leda meditation session pettukundam. Beach trip ki perfect ending idi.

Suggest a quick breakfast recipe that uses eggs and bread.

Quick and easy egg breakfast.

Varninchu oka chinna sweet shop ela start cheyalo.

Naaku sweets ante chala istam andi, nenu oka small scale lo sweet shop start cheyali anukuntunnanu. Naaku konni tips ivvagalaru?

Sweet shop start cheyadaniki mundu, mana area lo market research cheyali. Evaru ekkada sweets konukkuntunaro, endulu popular sweets ento telusukovali. Tarvata, oka manchi location choose cheyali, easyga customers ki reach ayyela. Shop setup ki avasaramaina permissions and licenses pondali. Quality suppliers ni vetukkoni, vaallu natural ingredients use chestunnaro ledo confirm chesukovali. Regular ga customer preferences batti menu update cheyali. Promotions and advertisements dwara, mee sweet shop gurinchi andariki teliyajeyali. Lastly, prati sweet meedha full love and care petti prepare cheyali. Ee simple steps follow aiyyaka, mee sweet shop pakka success avutundi. All the best!

Rastu oka chinna essay Onam panduga gurinchi.

Onam panduga enti? Andulo pratyeka events emaina unnaya?

Onam oka pedda panduga, Kerala lo jarige pramukhatamaina panduga. Ippudu manam Onam panduga gurinchi konchem telusukundam. Onam ani peru Vamanavatara Mahabali raja gurinchi jarige oka sampradaaya panduga. Kerala vaallu chaala aadharapoorvamga ee pandugani jaruputaru. Vannallo pookalam ani muggulu vestaru, oka bhaari vibhinna rakala naivedhyalu tayaru chesi Bhagavantudini poojistaru, Vallamkali ani peru tho boat races chala famous. Aa boat race chustene pratyeka thrill. Aa kalakaalam lo Mahabali raja raajyamlo prajalu sukhapadina rojulu gurthu cheskuntaru. Ee panduga rojulu lo pratyeka attalu, pattu vastralu, dance forms vanti cultural events kuda jarugutai. Onam tho patu keraleeyula unity and culture nu celebrate cheyadam oka pedda vishesham.

Explain the process of making a tomato pachadi in simple steps in Telugu.

Tomato pachadi ela cheyali?

Tomato pachadi cheyadaniki munduga tomatoes ni baga wash chesi, peel cheskoni, small pieces ga cut chesi pakkana pettukovali. Taruvata, oka pan lo koncham oil vesi, mustards, jeelakarra, curry leaves, and chopped tomatoes vesi fry cheyali. Tomatoes soft ayyaka, koncham tamarind paste, uppu, karam, and bellam vesi cook cheyali daaka. Chivara lo, koncham roasted methi powder jodu chesi mix chesi stove off cheyali. Cool ayinaka mixer lo fine paste ga grind cheyali. Fresh coriander to garnish chesi serve cheyali. Simple ga intlo enjoy chesukovacchu ee tomato pachadi.

Describe the importance of preserving forests in a brief paragraph using simple Telugu words mixed with English.

Importance of forests

Forests mana planet ki chala important. Vati valla, manaki fresh oxygen undi breathe cheyadaniki, climate control avuthundi, and biodiversity ki kuda help chesthundi. Anthe kadu, chala rakala animals ki forests home laga untayi, and chetla valla water sources kuda clean ga maintain avutayi. Forests lenidhe earth balance disturb avthundi, global warming increase avthundi. So, manam forests ni preserve cheyadam important for a better future.

Vivek and Priya tho phone lo matladutunna about their Europe trip plans. Priya ki Spain lo best places gurinchi suggest cheyyi, oka itinerary format lo.

Vivek asks Priya, Spain lo manam visit cheyalsina best places enti?

Priya replies, First, Barcelona lo start chestham. Sagam roju la Gaudi's architecture chuddam, like Sagrada Familia and Park Guell. Tarvata La Rambla and Gothic Quarter explore cheyyochu. Next day, Madrid ki veldham, Prado museum and Royal Palace chustham. Andulo okaroju Toledo city ki day trip plan cheyyochu, chala beautiful and historic place. Last lo, Seville ki vellipodham, Andalusian culture experience cheskundam. Flamenco show kuda miss avvakunda chudali. Ide rough itinerary, details lo discuss cheddam.

Amma tho phone lo matladi, dinner ki emi vandukovalo adugu.

Amma, nenu friends tho bayata dinner ki vellala leda intlo ne prepare cheyyala?

Amma: Intlo ne una dear, mana kosam special chicken biryani vandukunta. Meeru fresh avvandi, dinner ki ready undandi.

Vijayawada lo manchi restaurant suggest cheyandi nenu friends tho dinner ki vellali.

Budget-friendly options kavali mariyu vegetarian foods undali.

Vijayawada lo Ruchulu Rajam ane restaurant chala baguntundi. Budget ki tagga prices lo manchi vegetarian options vasthayi. Friends tho kalisi dinner ki perfect place, specially Paneer Tikka and Chole Bhature try cheyandi, chala famous akkada.

Write a short essay on the importance of saving water in Romanized Telugu.

Not required

Water save cheyadam enduku important ante, mana daily life lo water lekunda emi cheyyalem. Manam viniyoginchina prathi chukka water ki value ivvali. Water lekapothe, manushulu, jantulu, mokkalu inka survive cheyyaleru. Mana future generations ki clean water andhariki andubatulo undela choodatam mana responsibility. So, please try to reduce water waste, reuse water whenever possible and always remember to recharge groundwater by rainwater harvesting. Ee simple steps follow aithe, manam chala water save cheyochu. Adi kaadu, water bills lo kuda save avutam. Let's try to be more water-wise from today!
